# GitHub Topics for Repository

Add these topics to your GitHub repository to make it more discoverable:

## Primary Topics
- python
- flight-search
- amadeus-api
- travel
- flight-finder
- meeting-destination
- flight-matching
- travel-planner

## Secondary Topics
- python3
- flights
- api
- amadeus
- travel-app
- flight-api
- destination-finder
- trip-planner
- flight-booking
- travel-tools

## Technology Topics
- yaml
- csv
- poetry
- rest-api
- open-source

## How to Add Topics

1. Go to your GitHub repository
2. Click on the gear icon (⚙️) next to "About" section
3. In the "Topics" field, add the topics listed above
4. Press Enter after each topic
5. Click "Save changes"

This will make your repository appear in searches for:
- "flight search python"
- "amadeus api"
- "find flights"
- "flight finder"
- "meeting destination"
- "travel planner"
- And many more related searches!
